===With Halves===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** When HP is less than 60%, ATK is increased by 50% and DEF is increased by 50%.
** When HP is less than 45%, Normal Attack SPD is increased by 30%.
** When HP is less than 45%, Movement SPD is increased by 30%.
** When HP is less than 30%, CRIT Rate is increased by 20% and CRIT DMG is increased by 40%.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's First Half, the Hydro Abyss Mage is empowered with a Hydro Aura which inflicts characters with Slowing Water.
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, one of the Pyro Abyss Mages are empowered with a Pyro Aura.
**In Chamber 2's First Half, there is a {{Cryo}} Elemental Node that periodically applies a massive resistance and defense buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Pyro}} attacks.
**In Chamber 2's Second Half, there is a {{Pyro}} Elemental Node that applies a massive resistance and attack buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Hydro}} attacks.
